ygData.subject: The pods and a huge attack on Galvatron
ygData.msgSnippet: Brix transformed into beast mode, leveling the pod on his large centaur arms. Here, I ll help. And I ll run ahead and scout that other pod. On our way here

Subject: The pods and a huge attack on Galvatron

Brix transformed into beast mode, leveling the pod on his large 
centaur arms.

"Here, I'll help."

"And I'll run ahead and scout that other pod. On our way here we saw 
you, so I know where to go."

Fliq went to Beast Mode and scampered off, still excited about having 
this much agility. Brix turned to Ramulus.

"So shall we go?"

______________________________________________________________________
Vulois saw that his attacks weren't working. He had to use all of his 
mind strength. He locked on Galvatron and entered his mind.

"Hello Galvatron. Why are you doing this? Why are you trying to stop 
peace? Because if you don't turn around right now, and take your gang 
with you. This is what will happen."

Vulois showed him a picture of a ship, with every bot in it, leaving 
for Cybertron. Every bot except Galvatron. He was in the laval pits, 
buring up and melting. Vulois tapped his sense circuts to make him 
feel the pain of the image, at a x10 rate. He than locked it out with 
a huge password that only he knew. It would take Galvatron weeks to 
figure it out.

"Leave Galvatron. Leave us, and no harm will come to you. Stay, and 
this will happen. If you go, I will remove the image. But until you 
do, the pain will always be there. If you kill me, it will not go. 
NOW LEAVE!!!"

Vulois snapped back into his body. He had his blasters at the ready, 
watching Galvatron.
